pkmkdoc.description: Bombax is the world's best OS X web development platform. This installer includes the Bombax server, administration application, Bombaxtic development framework, Xcode integration, and supporting tools.

choice.title: Bombax Server
choice.description: The Bombax GUI administration application and core server functionality (required)

choice.title: Bombaxtic Framework
choice.description: Essential libraries for running and developing BxApps (required)

choice.title: Xcode Development Support
choice.description: Development support in Xcode including templates and syntax highlighting

choice.title: BXML Development Tools
choice.description: Installs development tools necessary to create client handlers from BXML

choice.title: Xcode Development Documentation
choice.description: Bombaxtic framework documentation installed into the Xcode help system

choice.title: Bombax Developers Guide
choice.description: Installs Bombax Developer's Guide into the /Developer/Documentation directory

choice.title: Database Drivers
choice.description: Oracle, PostgreSQL, MySQL, and SQLite database drivers (required)
